languages.text: "Жалкое покушение — уже второе за сегодня. Кто-то из тюремщиков не запер камеры, чтобы заключенные сделали грязную работу. Ничего, я найду виновных и казню каждого".

"A pathetic attempt on my life. The second one today. One of the jailers left the cells unlocked so the prisoners could do their dirty work. No matter. I will find the culprits and execute each and every one of them."
languages.original_text: "Жалкое покушение — уже второе за сегодня. Кто-то из тюремщиков не запер камеры, чтобы заключенные сделали грязную работу. Ничего, я найду виновных и казню каждого".

traits.locale_text: "A pathetic attempt on my life, the second one today. One of the jailers didn't lock the cells so the prisoners could do their dirty work. No matter, I will find the culprits and execute each and every one."

"A pathetic attempt on my life, the second one today. One of the jailers didn't lock the cells so the prisoners could do their dirty work. No matter, I will find the culprits and execute each and every one."

"A pathetic attempt on my life. The second one today. One of the jailers left the cells unlocked so the prisoners could do their dirty work. No matter. I will find the culprits and execute each and every one of them."

languages.text: 「俺の命を狙う情けない試みだ。今日だけで二回目だ。看守の一人が監房の鍵をかけずにおいて、囚人たちが汚い仕事をできるようにしたんだろう。問題ない。犯人を見つけ出し、一人残らず処刑してやる」
languages.original_text: "A pathetic attempt on my life. The second one today. One of the jailers left the cells unlocked so the prisoners could do their dirty work. No matter. I will find the culprits and execute each and every one of them."

traits.locale_text: 「俺の命を狙う情けない試みだ。今日だけで二回目だ。看守の一人が監房の鍵をかけずにおいて、囚人たちが汚い仕事をできるようにしたんだろう。問題ない。犯人を見つけ出し、一人残らず処刑してやる」

languages.text: "Ein erbärmlicher Anschlag auf mein Leben. Schon der zweite heute. Einer der Wärter hat die Zellen offen gelassen, damit die Häftlinge die Drecksarbeit machen können. Spielt keine Rolle. Ich werde die Schuldigen finden und sie alle hinrichten."
languages.original_text: "A pathetic attempt on my life. The second one today. One of the jailers left the cells unlocked so the prisoners could do their dirty work. No matter. I will find the culprits and execute each and every one of them."

traits.locale_text: "Ein erbärmlicher Anschlag auf mein Leben. Schon der zweite heute. Einer der Wärter hat die Zellen offen gelassen, damit die Häftlinge die Drecksarbeit machen können. Spielt keine Rolle. Ich werde die Schuldigen finden und sie alle hinrichten."

languages.text: « Une autre pathétique tentative d'attenter à ma vie. C'est la deuxième, aujourd'hui. L'un de geôliers a laissé les portes déverrouillées pour que les prisonniers se chargent eux-mêmes de cette tâche ingrate. Qu'importe. Je vais retrouver les coupables et les faire tous exécuter, jusqu'au dernier ! »
languages.original_text: "A pathetic attempt on my life. The second one today. One of the jailers left the cells unlocked so the prisoners could do their dirty work. No matter. I will find the culprits and execute each and every one of them."

traits.locale_text: « Une autre pathétique tentative d'attenter à ma vie. C'est la deuxième, aujourd'hui. L'un de geôliers a laissé les portes déverrouillées pour que les prisonniers se chargent eux-mêmes de cette tâche ingrate. Qu'importe. Je vais retrouver les coupables et les faire tous exécuter, jusqu'au dernier ! »

languages.text: «Un patético atentado contra mi vida. El segundo en lo que va de día. Uno de los carceleros dejó las celdas abiertas para que los reclusos pudieran hacerle el trabajo sucio. No importa. Daré con los responsables y los ejecutaré a todos y cada uno de ellos».
languages.original_text: "A pathetic attempt on my life. The second one today. One of the jailers left the cells unlocked so the prisoners could do their dirty work. No matter. I will find the culprits and execute each and every one of them."

traits.locale_text: «Un patético atentado contra mi vida. El segundo en lo que va de día. Uno de los carceleros dejó las celdas abiertas para que los reclusos pudieran hacerle el trabajo sucio. No importa. Daré con los responsables y los ejecutaré a todos y cada uno de ellos».

languages.text: “不过是某个渣滓想害我，今天已经是第二次了。某个狱卒故意没有锁门，让那些囚犯替他干肮脏的勾当。不过不要紧，我会找到那些幕后黑手，把他们一个个处死。”
languages.original_text: "A pathetic attempt on my life. The second one today. One of the jailers left the cells unlocked so the prisoners could do their dirty work. No matter. I will find the culprits and execute each and every one of them."

traits.locale_text: “不过是某个渣滓想害我，今天已经是第二次了。某个狱卒故意没有锁门，让那些囚犯替他干肮脏的勾当。不过不要紧，我会找到那些幕后黑手，把他们一个个处死。”

languages.text: "Acınası bir şekilde hayatıma kastedildi. Bugün ikinci kez oluyor. Zindancılardan biri, mahkûmların işlerini görebilmesi için hücreleri açık bırakmış. Fark etmez. Suçluları bulacağım ve her birini teker teker infaz edeceğim."
languages.original_text: "A pathetic attempt on my life. The second one today. One of the jailers left the cells unlocked so the prisoners could do their dirty work. No matter. I will find the culprits and execute each and every one of them."

traits.locale_text: "Acınası bir şekilde hayatıma kastedildi. Bugün ikinci kez oluyor. Zindancılardan biri, mahkûmların işlerini görebilmesi için hücreleri açık bırakmış. Fark etmez. Suçluları bulacağım ve her birini teker teker infaz edeceğim."
